'Reservoir Dogs,' directed by Quentin Tarantino, is a gripping crime thriller that centers around a group of criminals following a jewelry heist gone wrong. While Henry Silva isn't a main character in this film, the impressive cast includes notable actors like Tim Roth and Michael Madsen.
